entries.title: Major update
entries.text:
- Scientist buffs (damage speed, movement speed increase)
- Fixed black screen bug after teleporting to Nod-Krai
- Added end cutscene and credits
- Fixed player collisions
- Added in-game pause menu
- Insane Mode added
- Hardcore Mode and Insane Mode badges
- Skip text for intro cutscene
- Popups fully integrated and fixed
- Ifa changes (he now follows the player if too far)
- Fixed Anemo ability not being granted from Red Riot
- Changed prefab size of Ghost Bomb
- Fixed main menu image size
- Slime King, Scientist and Lucifer now heal on player death
- And more!

entries.title: First release
entries.text: - Fully playable version of Slime Impact 2D
